affiliations.hospitalName: Max Planck Unit for the Science of Pathogens

bio: Emmanuelle Charpentier is a pioneer in CRISPR-Cas9 at Max Planck Unit for the Science of Pathogens, Germany. With a D-Index of 136 and over 160,000 citations, they are among the world's most influential researchers.
